sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { validAge:boolean = true; validName:boolean = true; validEmail:boolean = true; formValidation = new FormGroup({ name:new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.minLength(3)]), age:new FormControl(null,[Validators.required,Validators.min(20),Validators.max(40)]), email:new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.email]) } ) submit(){ this.validAge = this.formValidation.controls.age.valid; this.validName = this.formValidation.controls.name.valid; this.validEmail = this.formValidation.controls.email.valid; console.log( this.formValidation.controls.name.valid) console.log( this.formValidation.controls.age.valid) console.log( this.formValidation.controls.email.valid) } }
Registration Form
Valid.
Please fill out this field.
Age Between 22 and 40
Not Valid Email
